column5: I am really liking their line up of products( My new wader jacket quality has my mind set on them ), but I can only find state side retailers or the frog togg site it,s self and free shipping is only state side, plus it,s in US $. Anyone know a retailer in the Toronto area that carries their products ? Looking for waders and jackets .  Thanks
You know I am a hands on and try kinda guy .
That’s what she said.   Lol. cabelas carry a bit https://www.cabelas.com/product/home/frogg-toggs-rainwear/pc/105625080/c/1548694080/frogg-toggs-mens-hellbender-ii-bf-pnt/2605700.uts?slotId=7
Nope. Strike 2  You know I am in that store 3 times a week .LMAO  And don't try BPS. They only have the jackets that I bought already. LOL

Well if you order it and have it shipped to me I can either forward it to you or bring it back with me the end of March and drop it at your door on my way up to French River. Let me know if that helps and I'll pm you my address.

Walmart.ca has online only, fortnine.ca has items (my MRS buys there for the motorcycle stuff). gpbikes.ca too, can tire did sell frogg toggs but a retailer in the GTA might have stock too called https://www.motioncanada.ca/brand/09781/Frogg+Toggs/en
Looks like you have to take a road trip to the US to look touch and try on.
Thanks for the generous offer Cliff, but like I said, try,fit and feel .
Need a passport for that right ? LOL
I got mine at BPS in North York.  But that was a few years back.
Just an FYI, I owned 2 pair of frogg togg waders a few seasons ago. They both leaked after one season of pretty light use (no bushwacking or anything).  Just throwing that out there.

Thanks blaque for your input. I read alot of good, and few bad . Maybe keep my mind open and shop other brands . Red heads are out as I have had 2 pairs and leak on the seams . My new to me 20 yo Simms are nice, just looking for back ups.
Ya i swore id never spend the money on simms, until I did haha
